item.description:
PLEASE DO NOT DOUBLE TRIPLE OR QUADRUPLE RSVP

Kitty OSheas is an awesome spot to host another Mix and Mingle cross Meetup party for 160 members on Friday Oct 23, 2009. This is not a Singles Party. Meaning anyone can come which including couples. All are welcome to Party and Socialize.biggrin

Location: Kitty OSheas is in Boston (near Faneuil Hall) 131 State St Boston, MA 02109 617-725-0100 Website http://www.kittyoshea....

The 2nd floor can hold 160 people. shock There are 2 Bars upstairs, 4 huge comfy couches, AC, its own DJ area with light machine and dance floor, plus its own bathrooms upstairs so we would truly have out own private party.

Note: Music will medium levels in main room upstairs. Music will be tuned very low in the back room so members can have a separate area to chat!
Till about 9PM then the Dancing and music starts, then its gets loud .
There will be 3 Bartender upstairs: 2 at the upfront Bar and 1 in the back .
Some appetizers (Wings/veggie platter, cheeses etc) are available.

Please find Biagio at the party and please give him $5 to help cover the cost of the event.

After you get inside there is a Security at the stairs please tell them you are with Social Fun to get in (Even if you are with a different group) . If you say ANY other group they will not let you in. I had a few issues with this last time and Security did not let some people in, because they could not remember to say they were with Social Fun.


2. After 9PM you will have to pay another $10 as a cover charge for the Bar Entrance fee to get in so that $15 total. $10 to bar and $5 to cover the cost to rent the 2nd floor.
3. If you get in before 9PM you ONLY have to pay $5 to Biagio to cover the cost to rent. Make sure you get there early!
4. Tell Security you are with Social Fun to get in -Even if you are with a different group.



The 6 Meetup Groups that are invited to come:


* Social Fun http://www.meetup.com....
* The Boston Happy Hour http://nightlife.meet....
* Beantown and Beyond 20-40 Singles http://singles.meetup....
* The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group http://euro.meetup.co....
* The Boston Night Life Meetup Group http://www.meetup.com....
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) and/or Biagio from Social Fun group. If need to, please call 774 232 0000
item.name: Mix and Mingle at Kitty O'Shea's. Huge Event with Other Great Groups!
